snippet: U.S. senators condemned the crackdown in Caracas, while local authorities said the camps had become “generators of violence” where weapons and materials for Molotov cocktails were found.
lead_paragraph: U.S. senators condemned the crackdown in Caracas, while local authorities said the camps had become “generators of violence” where weapons and materials for Molotov cocktails were found.

headline.main: Venezuela Arrests 243 in Raids on Antigovernment Protest Camps
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Arrests 243 in Raids on Antigovernment Protest Camps
